event.name: Jun Fan Jeet Kune Do Seminar
event.tagline: THE HERITAGE. THE ESSENCE. THE EVENT.
event.subtitle: This seminar represents the core of Jun Fan Jeet Kune Do

location.address: 1414 127th Pl NE #104, Bellevue, WA 98005, United States

hero.title: THE HERITAGE. THE ESSENCE.
hero.subtitle: This seminar represents the core of Jun Fan Jeet Kune Do
hero.description: Learn from Sifu Abe Santos and Sifu Greglon Yimm Lee - the authentic heirs of Bruce Lee's martial art.
hero.urgency: Strictly limited spots â€¢ 2 days total immersion

whyUnique.title: More than a seminar. A transmission.
whyUnique.problem: Do you practice martial arts but feel like you're missing a connection to the source? Are you seeking the efficiency, fluidity, and authenticity of original Jeet Kune Do?
whyUnique.solution: This seminar is a rare opportunity to receive direct teaching from Sifu Abe Santos and Sifu Greglon Yimm Lee, who hold knowledge from the purest lineage of Bruce Lee.
whyUnique.promise: In two days, you won't just learn techniques. You'll integrate principles that will transform your practice, your philosophy, and your effectiveness.

instructors.name: Sifu Abe Santos
instructors.title: Seattle Jeet Kune Do
instructors.bio: Co-founder of Jun Fan Gung Fu Academy, Sifu Abe Santos is a Senior Instructor directly certified by Taky Kimura. With decades of experience, he conducts seminars internationally and has been recognized by Linda Lee for preserving Bruce Lee's authentic teachings.
instructors.lineage: Most faithful student of Taky Kimura
instructors.philosophy: "I teach the art as I received it from Sigung Taky Kimura, who received it from Sijo Bruce Lee - direct, efficient and explosive, eliminating anything unnecessary."

instructors.name: Sifu Greglon Yimm Lee
instructors.title: Oakland Jeet Kune Do
instructors.bio: Son of James Yimm Lee, Bruce Lee's historic training partner and close friend, Sifu Greglon carries on the family legacy with unparalleled expertise in trapping techniques and the original Oakland curriculum of Bruce Lee's art.
instructors.lineage: Son of James Yimm Lee (Bruce Lee's partner)
instructors.philosophy: "Every movement must have a purpose, every technique absolute efficiency."

program.title: The Program: Deep Dive into JKD Core
program.subtitle: A weekend of total immersion in Bruce Lee's authentic art

day1.title: Day 1: Jun Fan Gung Fu Basics

testimonials.name: Sebastien Espanan
testimonials.comment: I have been fortunate to meet Sifu Abe Santos and train under the lineage of Sigung Taky Kimura. Sifu Abe's teaching goes beyond technique, exploring the philosophy, directionality and efficiency of Jun Fan Gung Fu Jeet Kune Do.
testimonials.highlight: More than technique - philosophy and efficiency

testimonials.name: Leong Lim
testimonials.comment: As a certified instructor under Sigung Taky, Sifu Abe has a unique, individual and dynamic teaching style of the Jun Fan JKD curriculum. The key principle I learned: executing techniques directly, efficiently and explosively.

testimonials.name: Student Testimonial
testimonials.comment: The authenticity of receiving teachings from Bruce Lee's direct lineage through Taky Kimura to Sifu Abe Santos is extraordinary. This is not just martial arts training - it's a transmission of Bruce Lee's original vision.

packages.name: 2-Day Pass
packages.description: Complete access to all sessions, workshops, Q&A and photo session

packages.name: 1-Day Pass
packages.description: Access to one day of training of your choice

urgency.subtext: Don't wait, spots are strictly limited

faq.question: What level is required to participate?
faq.answer: The seminar is open to all levels. Beginners are welcome - our masters adapt their teaching to each participant. Martial arts experience is a plus but not required.

faq.question: What should I bring?
faq.answer: Wear comfortable clothes for movement (martial arts attire recommended). We'll provide all necessary equipment. Just bring your motivation and open mind!

faq.question: Will there be videos or photos?
faq.answer: Yes! A professional photo session with the masters is included. Educational videos will also be made for your personal learning (with your consent).

faq.question: Can I get a refund?
faq.answer: We offer full refund up to 7 days before the event. Beyond that, we propose transfer to a future seminar under conditions.

faq.question: Will certificates be issued?
faq.answer: Yes, all participants will receive a participation certificate signed by both masters, attesting to your training in authentic Jun Fan Jeet Kune Do art.
